law.catch_line: An organization that fails to file a report required by § 13-1509 of this subtitle is not entitled ...

text.section:
An organization that fails to file a report required by § 13-1509 of this subtitle is not entitled to a license under this subtitle until the later of:
1 year after the date the report is due; or
the day the report is filed properly.
An organization that is convicted of violating a gambling law of this State may not be issued a license under this subtitle until 1 month after the date of conviction.
